module.group: wildcarded column ordering in the search and also in the postprocess
module.param: index=_internal | head 1000 | timechart count | eval field1="foo" | eval field2="bar" | eval field3="baz" | fields - _time | fields field3 field1 *

module.name: HTML
module.param:
We do
| fields field3 field1 *
on the base search
and then
| fields count *
on the postprocess

the end result should be count field3 field1 field2.
But it is not. The second wildcarded fields command resets the "*" fields to alphanumeric order.
